Title: Julia, The Pet Tamer
Description:
I can tell you have been honing your pet battle skills, $n.  I think it's time for you to take on a real challenge.

Julia Stevens can be found at the Maclure Vineyards south of Stormwind.  She is an up and coming wild pet tamer and I think it's time you faced her in battle!
ObjectivesText: Defeat Julia Stevens in a pet battle.
PortraitGiverText: Put your skills to the test against Julia!
